transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan mam, bataiye.
Customer: Haan ji, good afternoon sir.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, bataiye.
Customer: Sir, ek problem thi, matlab jab hum lead le lete hain, aap bolte hain na bhi ek minute ka leke bhi aayi hai, teen minute pehle ki, matlab recent ki leads aa rahi hain.
Hm hm hm.
Customer: Lekin unki quantity kya hoti hai, ek box, ek set, toh unka kya karein?
Executive: Aap usme bhi recent wala karwao aur phir aap na jo waha pe aata hai bulk aur retail, usme aap bulk pe click kar lo aur pe aap bhi filter laga ke karo.
Customer: Kuch bhi kar lo sir, kuch bhi kar lo, jab bhi quantity aati hai aise hi aati hai aur uske baad maan lo humne lead buy kar bhi li, uske baad kya hota hai product change ho jata hai.
Executive: Usme quantity likhi nahi rehti hai?
Customer: Likhi rehti hai, kisi product ki achi quantity hoti hai toh hum buy kar lete hain woh lead. Uske after baad na woh kya hota hai, matlab product change ho jata hai. Agar nahi bhi hota toh unko call karo woh kehte hain nahi hume nahi chahiye, humne nahi le li. Ya by mistake dal gayi, uska kya karein hum?
Executive: Toh usme leads aap mein ek do jo hoga woh aapka reverse karwa dunga aapke liye. Itna kar sakta hu. Ji, ek do byleads.
Customer: Solve karni chahiye na. Aapki details share karte rahiye, verify bhi karwa lunga, kuch leads reverse karwa dunga, yeh aapke liye help kar sakta hu.
Customer: Okay sir, okay, jarur main bataungi, aap ek baar sir se baat kar lo.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Bataiye sir hain, Vijay? Karwa dijiye baat.
Customer: Haan ji sir, ek minute hold karein.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir, bataiye.
Executive: Namaskar sir ji.
Customer: Haan haan, namaskar sir. Woh sir aapko wahi bheja tha ji, jo actually aa raha tha, wahi tha.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Ab kya karein ji hum, kya kar sakte hain? Haan main kuch valid ka, kuch valid reverse karwa dunga sir ek do, woh main dekh leta hu kya kar sakta hu. Aur baki jo aapne detail mein photos de hi rahe ho aap, uska main jo photos de rahe ho aap detail mein backend se verify karwa leta hu.
Customer: Sir pata kya hai, main nahi keh sakta, main aapko roz tang karu woh bhi nahi achha lagta, kyunki aap kai baar mood mein baat aise nahi, baat aise hai sir. Kai baar banda mood mein hota hai, nahi mood mein hota hai. Par hum kya karein sir? Main aapko keh raha hu subeh se shaam tak hum IndiaMART pe aake baithe hote hain, laptop ke. Kyunki aise bhi nahi hai hum do lead ke chakkar mein baithe rahenge ji, hum isko bada matlab ki aap kahoge isko toh issue kar le hum, isiliye isko solve kar rahe hain bhi humne bade package karne hain. Sir ek matlab ki is do lead par thodi baithenge ji. Par kya karein ji aapko humne isiliye screenshot bhej diye ji.
Executive: Haan haan. Sir aa hi nahi raha ji kuch, kya karein ji?
Customer: Quantity ka, aap mam ne bola ki kare woh toh aa raha hai, but quantity ka aa raha hai, matlab quantity ka issue aa raha hai, yeh bata rahi hai madam.
Customer: Sir ek minute pehle lead chali gayi.
Customer: Sir ek minute ji, aur gal kareyo ji, ek minute speaker te.
Customer: Aa dekho ji. Sir, sir fraud aa raha hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji mam.
Customer: Sir maine abhi abhi saat minute pehle lead thi woh, abhi li, aapka call aane se pehle, maine abhi unko call kiya toh unhone bola yeh product maine ek ghanta pehle kisi aur company se order kar liya.
Executive: Achha, yeh jo kaunsa wala yeh Mumbai wali hai?
Customer: Kaunsa Mumbai wali ya phir Proddatur wali?
Customer: Andhra Pradesh wali hai yeh.
Executive: Achha. Haan ji. Mam yeh toh hai, theek hai, matlab aap kar toh dekho pehle tha ki recent valid nahi aa rahi thi woh aa, at least woh aap consume kar pa rahe ho, thoda sa ho raha hai. Fraud aa ja rahe ho ji. Paanch logo ko karte hain na fraud kar rahe ho sade naal sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi, koi fraud nahi ho raha sir. Sir fraud kya nahi hai, saat minute pehle ki lead hai aap usko ek ghante pehle purchase bhi kar liya ji.
Customer: Sir koi baat hoti hai hum aapke piche phir rahe hain. Ek cheez batao unhone, sir unhone bylead bhi dala hoga, unhone inquiry bhi ki hogi kisi company mein toh is wajah se woh requirement fulfill ho gayi hogi sir. Sir saat minute pehle thodi ho sakta hai sir sara kuch ho gaya ho ji. Aise thodi karna chahiye ji hum matlab ki aap hume kharab kar rahe hain ji.
Executive: Sir yeh wala Andhra wala mujhe WhatsApp kijiye ek baar, Andhra wala mujhe WhatsApp kijiye.
Customer: Sir aapko aapke paas hai aapki company ka hai aapke paas dikh raha hai humne hum toh aapse le rahe hain ji toh jo aapko paanch bheji hai pata kya hai sir, aap usko ghuma dete hain ji, aise hai aise kar lo, aise kar lo, kaise kar le ji batao toh sahi sir. Sir sir dimag kharab ho gaya itne din se ji. Sir time toh matlab ek ek ka aap keh rahe ho matlab sab ek jaise nahi honge na, 70% sahi di ho phir bhi toh ek do hi toh problem aa rahi hai na, 70% toh sahi aa raha hai na sir ji. Sir aa hi nahi raha hai batao hume ji. Sir humne time liya ek hafte ka ki at least ek hafte ka hum overview karenge phir milenge toh at least sir pura ek ek ka mat bhejiye sir matlab at least 15-20 ka ek aur hone toh dijiye ki us 15-20 mein kitna dikkat aa rahi hai kya aa rahi hai sir, utna toh hone dijiye ek baar. Sir pata kya hai meri baat suno, mera kehne ka maksad hai, main aapko clear bata deta hu aaj ki date note kar lo, aaj ka time note kar lo. Jo aap bata rahe ho na kal bataya hai wahi mujhe ek 15 10 din ke baad bataoge. Sir hum kya karenge teen mahine pehle nikal diye humne, meri benti toh sun lo sir. Meri benti toh sun lo sir, teen mahine pehle nikal diye humne. Wahi jo aap bataoge na, main aapko bata raha hu by record kar lena, wahi mujhe 10 din baad mein bata doge. Sir kya karenge ji hum, kya karenge isko kara? Aap kehte ho lead aa rahi hai, lead kya aa rahi hai ji kara? Ek dibbe ki aur ek matlab ki uski lead lene ke liye hum baithe hain ji, Jammu Kashmir bhejenge ya matlab ki Mumbai bhejenge aise bhejenge sir koi hoti hai ji aap kaam kar rahe ho itne saal se, aapko matlab ki aapka lakh rupaye ki koi pay ho aapko 100 rupya 10 fada de aapko bhi le le 100 rupya le lo ji, aap manoge usko kara ji?
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Nahi aapko achha lagega kisi ka aapki pay hai maan lo lakh rupya ji aap usko woh aapko 100 rupya de de aapko achha lagega ji woh?
Executive: Nahi sir nahi.
Customer: Sir achha lagega mujhe bata toh do na sir. Nahi nahi achha lagega sir nahi achha lagega. Fir woh wahi baat humare se ho rahi hai ji.
Executive: Haan. Sir ek ko aise mat karo bhi aapke paas lead aa rahi hai. Lead lekar kya karenge lead toh pehle hi humne chota package le liya hai. Humare paas do lead aati hai woh bhi aap matlab ki aise ek ek mein ek farzi dalkar kar diya pura ho gaya aapka matlab ki by data ban gaya bhi humne itni lead Rapid Pharmaceutical ke khate mein de di balle balle hai ji balle balle hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai balle balle.
Executive: Karwata hu sir isko bhi jaan.
Customer: Theek hai sir, theek hai ji, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Low quantity of leads received.

- Product changes after buying the lead.

- Leads are old; customers already purchased product.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to reverse one or two leads.

- Executive will verify details from backend.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share Andhra lead on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quantity, product change, reverse leads
